questions.question: Can you explain the significance of Amendment 4 and its impact on voting rights for felons in Florida?
How did your daughter feel about voting for the amendment that allows you to vote?
What emotions did you experience at the thought of being able to vote after so many years?

section: Challenges of Life After a Conviction

questions.question: What are some of the challenges you face as a felon trying to reintegrate into society?
How do you believe the system can be improved to help individuals after serving their sentences?

section: Anticipation of Receiving Voter Registration Card

questions.question: How do you plan to celebrate when you finally receive your voter registration card?
What does receiving your voter registration card mean to you personally?
